hero.title: Our Services
hero.subtitle: Professional photography solutions for every need
hero.description: From aerial drone photography to ground-based shoots, we offer comprehensive photography services tailored to your specific requirements.

landingSection.title: Our Services
landingSection.subtitle: Photography solutions for every need
landingSection.description: We offer a wide range of professional photography services, including aerial drone photography, ground-based photography, event and wedding photography, commercial and real estate photography, as well as editing and post-production services.

services.title: Aerial Drone Photography
services.description: Capture stunning aerial perspectives with our professional drone services

services.title: Ground Photography
services.description: Professional ground-based photography for various occasions

services.title: Event Photography
services.description: Capture your special moments with our event photography services

services.title: Commercial Photography
services.description: Professional photography solutions for businesses and marketing

services.title: Editing & Post-Production
services.description: Professional editing services to enhance your visual content

process.title: Our Process
process.subtitle: How we work with you from concept to delivery

steps.title: Consultation
steps.description: We discuss your requirements and provide a customized quote

steps.title: Planning
steps.description: We plan the shoot details, locations, and timeline

steps.title: Shooting
steps.description: Professional photography session with our expert team

steps.title: Editing
steps.description: Post-production and editing to perfect your content

steps.title: Delivery

aerial.title: Aerial Photography
aerial.description: Stunning high-resolution drone shots from above — ideal for landscapes, real estate, and industrial projects.

commercial.title: Project Documentation
commercial.description: End-to-end photo and video documentation of construction or development projects, from foundation to delivery.

editing.title: Video Production
editing.description: Full video production service — cinematic drone footage, editing, branding, and storytelling for any purpose.

events.title: Event Coverage
events.description: Seamless drone and camera coverage of weddings, corporate events, sports, and cultural celebrations.
